ROSE AST Copy Mechanism

This page describes the AST copy mechanism in ROSE.

Design of the AST Copy Mechanism

The ROSE AST copy mechanism is supported by a member function on each IR nodes called "copy". A parameter to the copy member function permits the user to tailor the copy mechanism to do deep or shallow copies within selected portions of the AST.
